He received his B.E. degree in the Department of Computer Science from Tsinghua University, and his Ph.D. degree in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. His research interests include Internet of Things, Industrial Internet, sensing and positioning, edge computing, etc. He is an author and co-author of 4 books and over 120 research papers in premier journals and conferences. He received 4 best paper (candidates) awards and has over 17,000 citations with H-index 64. Ongoing projects include Widar (wireless and sensorless sensing), Ziggo (Time-Sensitive Networking), MoSen (mm-level optical positioning), CityPulse (smart city), etc. Outstanding Achievement Award for Scientific Research in Colleges and Universities (First Class), Ministry of Education, 2022 IEEE Fellow MSRA Collaborative Research Award 2019 Youth Top Talent Support Program ("Thousands-of-Talents Scheme") Beijing Nova Program 2011 State Natural Science Award (Second Class) Books Smart Wireless Sensing: From IoT to AIoT Zheng Yang, Kun Qian, Chenshu Wu, Yi Zhang 1st Edition, Springer, Singapore, 2021.
